page.title: 16HOLIDAY JOBS IN ST.IVES.
page.content:
We wanted to find out how many pupils in the comprehensive school had {part-time}or{seasonal jobs}.We asked each class four questions, a total of five hundred children between 11 & 16.
We found that{23%}of those surveyed have a part-time job all year round, while another{25%}have seasonal jobs. Among the people with seasonal jobs {64%}work in businesses which close down in the winter. About a quarter{(24%)}of the children questioned said that their parents were involved in the holiday trade.
We found in our amenity count that including bed and breakfast houses there were over{300 }places to stay in St. Ives. With over{40}restaurants, take-aways and cafes as well, there are plenty of summer jobs.
